column4: I attempted a "do-release-upgrade" on a Jaunty system to upgrade to Karmic
somewhere along the line, the ssh connection i used failed
I managed to ssh back in again, is there someway I can resume where it left off?
Militant: it tells me there is no new release, attempting apt-get update tells me there's a lock
you can only run one instance of apt at a time so close out synaptic
